_source.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
_source.long_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools for personalized live chat at scale. Chat with customers in your product, app and on your website and manage conversations in a next-generation Inbox that's easy to set up and use. Plus, leverage a full suite of customer communication tools for sales, marketing and support to engage customers with proactive outbound messaging, interactive product tours and more.
_source.pricing_details:
Intercom Essential: from $38/month

Intercom Pro: from $75/month

Intercom Premium: Custom pricing


Recommended add-ons:

- Custom Bots from $99/mo
- Answer Bot from $99/mo
- Product Tours from $119/mo
- Help Center Articles from $49/mo
_source.target_audience: Intercom has over 25,000 paying customers all over the globe including Atlassian, Meta & New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that?s quick to implement and easy to use.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that's quick to implement and easy to use. It lets you deliver real time, conversational support on web, mobile, and in apps-like WhatsApp. Pair it seamlessly with Zendesk's customer support solution to reduce customer wait times and increase efficiency. Response times can be as fast as 30 seconds and agent performance can improve by 25% after switching to Zendesk.

related_products.short_desc: Engage visitors to your website 24/7 with Pipedrive's Chatbot and Live Chat. Turn your window shoppers into qualified leads.
related_products.features: Turn your website window shoppers into qualified leads with Pipedrive's Chatbot and Live Chat. Chatbot engages your website visitors 24/7. Easily customize your bot's look, the questions it asks and how it replies. Have available sales reps add a human touch with Live Chat from their phones or desktop. If your team gets busy, Chatbot steps in so no leads slip away. Both tools are available in the LeadBooster add-on, which can be added to any Pipedrive CRM plan. Start your 14-day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho Desk embeddable live chat widgets for your customer service team. Now you can support your customers through your website & apps.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is a cloud-based helpdesk solution from Zoho. Key features include management of customer support tickets, support portal, contract management & report creation. With Zoho Desk's embeddable live chat widgets make instant responses for instant happiness. Your customers can get in touch with your agents instantly, right from the help center with contextual AI, so your agents can respond and help them find answers faster. Our free plan gives you 3 users free to head start your operations.

related_products.short_desc: LiveChat lets existing and prospective customers talk to your company via your website and give them a personal experience in real time
related_products.features: LiveChat is a live chat application that can be integrated into your website to capture more leads and close more sales. Having LiveChat on your website means that on-site visitors can send you their questions and receive answers in no time.

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured help desk and live-chat Software with over 195+ integrations. 

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. 

Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-Day free trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Userlike is the first and only live chat software to help your business win and nurture customers across messaging channels.
related_products.features:
Userlike combines website chat with mobile messaging.

Switch to a better method of customer communication. For your customers, support agents, sales reps and managers. 

Chat with your customers via your website, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram and SMS. Connect your chatbot and automate parts of your customer interactions. 

Born and hosted in Germany. Userlike keeps your and your customers' data safe with a 100% GDPR-compliant communication solution.

related_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
related_products.features:
Service Cloud, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee from the contact center to the field with the innovative tools. Embed real-time support on your website and in your apps with Chat. 
Start personalized live chats, in-app or online, with your customers based on how they're using your site. Deliver chat around the globe with multilingual support. And scale your customer support with AI-powered chatbots that help answer routine asks.

related_products.short_desc: #1 free live chat and contact center software used by over 8 million companies. Also comes with free CRM and email marketing.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free live chat software for your website, you'll love Bitrix24. First of all, free actually means free ? you can have as many chat sessions as you need, without limitations. Second, we don't limit free edition to a single chat agent ? you get twelve chat agents free of charge. Third, Bitrix24 is a fully featured omnichannel contact center.

related_products.short_desc: Webchat enables you to convert more website visitors into customers and deliver remarkable customer support through live chat
related_products.features:
Birdeye Webchat enables you to capture and convert leads from your website. We allow you to talk to
customers in real-time, use a chatbot to automate responses to frequently asked questions, or if you are busy, text them back when you have a moment. A single unified inbox allows you to manage all customer
conversations in one place. Reporting helps you track the number of active conversations, measure and
compare agent productivity, average resolution time, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Beautiful Live chat solution with CRM and Help Desk integration and powerful reporting capabilities. GDPR Ready and Accessible. API.
related_products.features:
Olark Live Chat is the easiest way to add live chat to your website. 
Over 40,000 organizations including small businesses, large businesses, non-profits, government entities, and higher education choose Olark. 

Add an Olark chat box to your site and start helping more customers and closing more sales. Olark integrates with a number of CRM, eCommerce and Help Desk platforms to provide you with automation, chatbots, and key customer insights.

GDPR Ready, WCAG 2.1 AA Accessible, and NIST 800-53

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that?s quick to implement and easy to use.
similar_products.features: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that's quick to implement and easy to use. It lets you deliver real time, conversational support on web, mobile, and in apps-like WhatsApp. Pair it seamlessly with Zendesk's customer support solution to reduce customer wait times and increase efficiency. Response times can be as fast as 30 seconds and agent performance can improve by 25% after switching to Zendesk.

similar_products.short_desc: 3CX Live Chat is a free live chat solution that offers extra calling capabilities and team communication features at no cost
similar_products.features: 3CX Live Chat is a free live chat solution with extra calling capabilities and team communication features added at no cost. Resolve issues faster through chat and voice. Visitors can chat, call or video call at the touch of a button without dialing numbers. Forward chats with history to agents or groups. Answer messages remotely with free mobile phone apps. Integrate Business Facebook messages and SMS to answer all communications from the same interface. No per user per month fees!

similar_products.short_desc: Multi-Company Live Chat Software, Secure, Reliable Customer Engagement & Real-Time Customer Support.
similar_products.features:
Vision Helpdesk's Live Chat Software is a secure, real-time multi-company live chat messaging platform that improves customer engagement by helping sales teams to convert website visitors into paying customer

Key Aspects of Live Chat Software -
* User-Friendliness 
* In-Built into Customer Support tools 
* Multi-Company Live Chat Management 
* Device-Independent (Browser-based) 
* Enhance Customer Support Team's productivity 
* Engage Website Visitors to Increase Sales.
* Powerful Automation

similar_products.short_desc: Freshchat is a modern messaging software built for customer engagement teams to talk to customers across channels.
similar_products.features:
Freshchat is the modern messaging solution that delivers effortless customer service for the digital-first customer by bringing together artificial and human intelligence across messaging channels.

With the world moving towards contactless service, customers expect on-demand, personalised support on familiar channels that are easily accessible.

This is where businesses use Freshchat's powerful messaging platform to service their customers on various digital channels using a blend of automation

similar_products.short_desc: Ada is an easy to use customer support automation platform.
similar_products.features: As the market leader in Automated Customer Experience (ACX), Ada personalizes customer engagement by putting the power of AI in the hands of the people who know your business best. With Ada, it's simple for non-technical teams to build an automated, enterprise-class chatbot platform that solves 70%+ of customer inquiries.

similar_products.short_desc: Inbenta Messenger module is an omnichannel ticketing and live chat solution that centralizes and speeds up case management using AI.
similar_products.features:
Inbenta Messenger is an omnichannel ticketing and live chat solution that converts all social media, website, and email contacts into a manageable queue. 

This helps agents handle tickets effortlessly from a single platform. 

Additionally, with its AI technology, it is able to smartly prioritize cases and suggest content in real-time to help agents answer questions in a single click. This reduces waiting and average handling times, leading to overall better customer service.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho SalesIQ is an all-in-one customer engagement, live chat and analytics platform that provides great customer experience.
similar_products.features: Zoho SalesIQ is an all-in-one customer engagement platform that provides live chat software, visitor tracking, AI bots (with code and codeless), audio calling, and more. Using SalesIQ helps unify the efforts of your marketing, sales, and customer support teams, providing a great customer experience and boosting business growth. Get to know your prospects better and increase your sales conversion now.

similar_products.short_desc: Tidio is a customer service platform that combines live chat and chatbots to improve customer support and generate more sales.
similar_products.features: Tidio combines live chat and chatbots in one tool, so you can delight your customers and improve your sales. It enables you to engage your visitors in real time, send personalized messages, and offer assistance via chatbots, anytime you are busy. Additionally, it connects to Messenger, Instagram, and email, so you can manage all communication channels from one place. Tidio is available on desktop and mobile, so you can answer messages on the go, from every device.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer requests across different communication channels.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Service software enables an organization to manage and track customer relationships and support services. From trouble ticket tracking to complaint resolution reporting, Customer Service software solutions allow organizations to manage and assess the quality of their interactions with customers. Customer Service applications also assist in the management and distribution of an internal knowledge base, providing customer service representatives with the information necessary to resolve customer complaints. Customer Service software is related to Call Center software, Help Desk software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Online CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Online CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Online CRM software enables web-based customer interaction, support and relationship management. Online customer relationship management applications provide customers with access to an organization's knowledge base assets, allowing customers to pursue a self-guided path to resolving product-related issues, either via the web or over the phone. Online CRM solutions can help increase the efficiency and utility of a call center, website or help desk by empowering customers to resolve issues on their own without engaging with customer service staff. Online CRM software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Enablement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Enablement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Enablement covers content and communication tools that help sales teams show off product information to prospective customers, engage potential leads, and overall boost sales team performance. These solutions align sales with marketing to ensure that the sales team gets the most up to date materials. Sales Enablement software includes presentation tools and gamification applications, as well as collaborative content editing and sharing solutions.

_source.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
_source.long_desc: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.
_source.pricing_details:
Intercom Essential: from $38/month

Intercom Pro: from $75/month

Intercom Premium: Custom pricing


Recommended add-ons:

- Custom Bots from $99/mo
- Answer Bot from $99/mo
- Product Tours from $119/mo
- Help Center Articles from $49/mo
_source.target_audience: Intercom has over 25,000 paying customers all over the globe including Atlassian, Meta & New Relic.

category_features.name: 2-Way Messaging
category_features.definition: Send and receive text messages in real time

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: MMS
category_features.definition: Send and receive multimedia messages (i.e. photos, videos, and audio recordings)

category_features.name: Mass Texting
category_features.definition: Send messages to multiple subscribers at the same time.

category_features.name: Message Personalization
category_features.definition: Automatically personalize text messages using templates and custom fields

category_features.name: Mobile Coupons
category_features.definition: Electronic coupons delivered to a mobile device that can be exchanged for a discount or rebate when purchasing a product or service

category_features.name: Mobile Keywords
category_features.definition: Unique word that contains letters or numbers that identifies specific campaigns

category_features.name: Polls/Voting
category_features.definition: Create quick polls to keep people engaged

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Scheduled Messaging
category_features.definition: Send individual or bulk text messages at predetermined times

category_features.name: Shortcodes
category_features.definition: Short phone numbers that are typically 5 to 6 digits long which are used to opt-in to SMS campaigns/promotions

category_features.name: Text-to-Win
category_features.definition: Contests and sweepstakes administered via text messages

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Notifications for new property listings

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Client/Property Matching
category_features.definition: Matching property according to applicants

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Referral Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and store the source of contacts/leads

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

related_products.short_desc: SMS Marketing 360? helps drive more sales.
related_products.features: SMS Marketing 360 makes creating text message campaigns easy. You can even create automated journeys where specific text messages are sent to specific people at specific times.

related_products.short_desc: iCIMS Talent Cloud is a cloud platform for recruiting that enables employers to manage their end-to-end talent hiring lifecycle.
related_products.features: Built for enterprise organizations, iCIMS is the Talent Cloud company that empowers organizations to attract, engage, hire and advance the right talent that builds a diverse, winning workforce. The iCIMS Talent Cloud is complemented by an ecosystem of more than 700 global partners. Yesterday's tools were not designed for the future of work. iCIMS provides innovations that meet employer's new and emerging strategic business and talent needs.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is #1 free SMS marketing software and CRM used by 8 million companies worldwide. Cloud and on-premise, with open source code.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 #1 free SMS marketing software and CRM, used by 8 million companies worldwide. Cloud and on-premise, with open source code access. You can send individual SMS messages even on the free plan, bulk SMS and SMS marketing automation are available to commercial Bitrix24 users, starting at $39/mo. Since we don't add any surcharges on SMS pricing offered by leading SMS providers, we are much cheaper than other SMS marketing services. Currently, you can send text messages in over 100 countries.

related_products.short_desc: The single messaging platform for your business to convert and engage leads and customers over text.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Messaging is a comprehensive digital communication tool that makes it easy to connect with customers across any digital channel, be it text, social, Webchat, email, or voicemail from one unified inbox. 

Birdeye Mass Texting is an affordable and easy way to reach customers through their prefered channel - text messaging. Connect one-on-one or reach thousands of customers in one go.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM's sms marketing software helps to leverage text messaging to maximize the communication channels you use to connect with your audience. Integrating SMS text messaging into your marketing campaigns or sales and support function can help you engage your audience at just the right time.

related_products.short_desc: SMS marketing software built for small business
related_products.features: Meet Thryv, the text (SMS) marketing software built for small business. Thryv integrates your contact list with text (SMS) marketing templates and automation so you can target the right person at the right time with the right message. Include coupons, promotions and interactive buttons that urge recipients to take action.

related_products.short_desc: The powerful texting platform your church and people will love. Send mass texts to your church & engage in two-way text conversations.
related_products.features:
The powerful texting platform your church and people will love.

With Clearstream, you can easily mass text your church and engage in two-way text conversations. But you can also streamline your guest follow-up process with text-to-join Keywords and workflows, manage multiple ministries or campuses with Subaccounts, and much more.

Thousands of churches, from new plants to many of the largest in the U.S., rely on Clearstream to better communicate with their members, and guests through texting.

related_products.short_desc: Mass SMS Text Messaging services. Great for sending bulk text messages, appointment reminders, coupons, sales, and more.
related_products.features: SMS Marketing Services made easy. Instantly send 10 or 100,000 SMS Text messages to any mobile phone number. Easily build an opt-in subscriber list. Schedule text messages to go out any time you want. Track text message delivery. Our plans start with a FREE 14-day trial period. Or try our Annual Plans and pay up-front for one year, and get 20% more messages instantly.

related_products.short_desc: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more.
related_products.features: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more. 55,000+ businesses and more than 2 million developers rely on Twilio to deliver their message when and where it counts.

related_products.short_desc: Swell helps you modernize your customer engagement through automated and one-to-one texting.
related_products.features: Swell helps you connect with customers and prospects through texting to provide seamless experiences and earn new business. It offers message management for everything from automated reminders to mass text campaigns to one-on-one conversations. With Swell, you can set up automatic review invitations to ask happy customers to leave reviews on the platforms that matter so you can rank higher online and get found by prospects.

related_products.short_desc: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more that gives you direct ownership of your customer data and interactions.
related_products.features: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform that gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions, empowering you to turn transactions with customers into productive long-term relationships-at scale. Because the Klaviyo database integrates seamlessly with your tech stack, you can get the full story on every customer that visits, and then-from the same platform-use those insights to automate personalized email and SMS communications that make people feel seen.

similar_products.short_desc: Engage with your customers using bespoke text message marketing campaigns.
similar_products.features:
Mobiz is a hyper-personalized mobile marketing platform that elevates and innovates customer engagement with data-driven personalization. Using a dynamic landing page template library, users can create and send customized mobile marketing campaigns at scale and via SMS in a few easy steps - all totally code-free.

The platform also offers a growth tool, helping users expand their subscriber list easily and compliantly. 

To learn more, visit https://bit.ly/3dRhnCZ

similar_products.short_desc: The single messaging platform for your business to convert and engage leads and customers over text.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Messaging is a comprehensive digital communication tool that makes it easy to connect with customers across any digital channel, be it text, social, Webchat, email, or voicemail from one unified inbox. 

Birdeye Mass Texting is an affordable and easy way to reach customers through their prefered channel - text messaging. Connect one-on-one or reach thousands of customers in one go.

similar_products.short_desc: Attentive's conversational commerce platform helps 5,000+ brands engage customers and drive billions in revenue via SMS marketing.
similar_products.features: Reach your customers where they are-their phones. Attentive's conversational commerce platform helps 5,000+ brands-from retail enterprises to e-commerce entrepreneurs-engage customers and drive billions in revenue via SMS marketing. We'll help you target the right audience for your messages, and measure your most important metrics to optimize your program. And with our flexible integrations, you can easily connect to the rest of your marketing stack, too. Learn more about our free 30-day trial.

similar_products.short_desc: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more.
similar_products.features: Engage your customers like never before with SMS, Facebook Messenger, RCS Business Messaging, Line, and more. 55,000+ businesses and more than 2 million developers rely on Twilio to deliver their message when and where it counts.

similar_products.short_desc: SMS texting and live chat for business has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers.
similar_products.features: SMS texting and live chat has never been easier than with Avochato's solutions for teams, marketers and contact centers. With no programming required, you can setup your Avochato phone number in minutes to text your prospects, customers, or staff. Segment, import, and broadcast to your contacts to scale your teams communications. Avochato integrates with platforms such as Salesforce, Slack, MS Teams, and Zapier. Enable prospects to text you from a Google Ad with the AdWords API integration.

similar_products.short_desc: EZ Texting delivers the smartest, fastest, easiest, and most reliable ways to connect with your customers and clients.
similar_products.features: EZ Texting is a SaaS company that delivers the fastest, easiest, and most reliable way to connect. It has served over 165,000 customers and is the #1 SMS platform for business users, setting the standard for business texting. Our messaging solutions allow businesses to quickly and effectively reach and engage their mobile audiences. With employees around the world, EZ Texting is continuously recognized as a Best Place to Work, as well as a top product for small and mid-market businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: You need more than just mass texting. Trumpia offers fully automated campaigns, so you can engage subscribers without doing more work.
similar_products.features: Mass texting alone won't give you the results you need, especially when sending irrelevant messages. Trumpia offers more than simple texting features, enabling you to accurately target every message you send. Our software will even carry out entire campaigns for you, so you can engage customers automatically without adding more work to your plate. Trumpia is favored by businesses of all sizes including Fortune 500s. Call us today at 855-912-0700.

similar_products.short_desc: Make marketing your business the easy part with a simple SMS Marketing platform like vcita. Start your free trial today!
similar_products.features: Take your marketing to the next level with simple SMS marketing with vcita. Link each SMS promotion to a beautiful landing page, enabling clients to take revenue-driving actions in a single click. Keep notes and view clients' payment history with ease from a single dashboard, and manage your billing and invoicing liike a pro. Never chase payments again with SMS payment reminders and focus on getting the word out about your services simply and professionally.

similar_products.short_desc: MessageMedia is a global leader in SMS services, providing an engaging messaging platform for over 65,000 businesses.
similar_products.features: We're a mobile messaging solution that helps businesses of all sizes better connect with customers. We create engaging mobile experiences for our 65,000+ global customers and help boost ROI. Find us in the USA, the UK, Australia and NZ.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully featured business text messaging platform to send bulk SMS text messages to customers, staff, and partners.
similar_products.features: TextMagic is a fully featured business text messaging platform that enables companies of all sizes to send bulk SMS text messages to their customers, staff, and partners. The service can be used to send sms notifications, alerts, and confirmations to clients, as well as to conduct SMS marketing campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: Whispir is a cloud platform for automating intelligent, rich communications.
similar_products.features: Whispir, Inc. is an all-in-one communications platform designed to help businesses and organizations communicate more humanly with their team and their customers. Whispir's capabilities include a wide range of intelligent messaging solutions, from SMS to email, voice, video, social, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: An easy-to-use SMS marketing solution that gets you more sales through the power of texting. Text all your customers in seconds.
similar_products.features: Mobile Text Alerts is an easy-to-use SMS marketing solution that gets you more sales & growth through the power of texting. Get up and running in seconds and enjoy our user-friendly online platform and mobile app, allowing you to easily set up SMS campaigns to market your products/services - engaging with customers and prospects efficiently and effectively. Free up time and hassle with automated messaging, flexible opt-in choices to build your subscriber list, analytics options, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Quick sign up, FREE TRIAL, no credit card required. Send Group SMS, MMS with emoji and short URL tracking. Sign up forms, SMS keywords.
similar_products.features: ProTexting is an SMS marketing platform designed for businesses in all industries. It provides easy to use way to communicate with your customers through group text messaging with emoji and MMS support. You can create text messaging campaigns for mobile surveys, voting, text in questions, text 2 screen, etc. Super FAST sending of your SMS Campaigns. 24/7 monitoring and support. FREE demo and On-boarding sessions are part of the services. FREE Toll-Free number for every account.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Channel Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Channel Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Channel Management software allows companies to streamline their distribution and sales efforts by organizing clients into specific segments and keeping track of marketing outreach and buying patterns. Specific types of Channel Management software focuses on partner programs. Channel Management software is related to Marketing Automation software, eCommerce software and Lead Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Email Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Email Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Email Marketing software enables the automation of email communication with prospects and customers. Organizations use Email Marketing software to increase the efficiency of their email marketing efforts, manage mailing lists and monitor the effectiveness of their marketing campaigns. Email Marketing applications can also aid in the regular production of customer-oriented newsletters, the management of email templates for multiple campaigns or market segments, and ongoing customer relationship management efforts. Email Marketing software is related to Campaign Management software and Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Marketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Marketing software helps businesses reach and engage their audiences on mobile devices via text messages and mobile optimized promotional offers and notifications.
